message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $12,500.  Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,250 for the product.
